sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const username = localStorage.getItem('username') || 'User'; // Get username from localStorage const [isProfileOpen, setIsProfileOpen] = useState(false); const [showNotification, setShowNotification] = useState(true); // State for notification visibility const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); navigate('/login'); }; return (
MovieVault {token && (
{showNotification && (
Welcome to your account, {username}!
)}
)} {token ? (
{isProfileOpen && (
Dashboard Profile My Favorites
)}
) : (
Login Sign Up
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
